turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good morning, Charlie. Can you please fetch me an coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good morning. I can certainly do that. Would you like it from the nearest Starbucks, by Ogden and Jefferson?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that would be fantastic!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! What would you like to order this morning?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hmm. I'll go with a mocha today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, great. Would you like that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd prefer hot today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, and will that be a regular mocha or with a special flavoring?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A regular mocha will suffice.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A venti would be grand.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good. Two percent milk as usual?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep, as usual.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, and then also, would you like them to add some whipped cream on top?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Of course!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any other specifications that you'd like changed or clarified? Any other flavors?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ooh let's add a dash of raspberry in to spice things up today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds great. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you, that will be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! I have ordered your mocha. It should be ready in about 5-8 minutes. I'll text you a copy of the receipt.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you! Bye for now.
